name: Five Nights At Telephone company
description:
Five Nights At Telephone company is a game about Liv, a worker of the last elf powered telephone exchange. Her job is to connect incoming calls to the correct receiver line.

Build reputation by  correctly connecting calls.
Be careful: if you make a mistake, or fail to connect the call in time, you will lose reputation.

After completing the game, you can enter your name to show your score on the leaderboard.

- Move by using the W A S D or ARROW keys, or alternatively, you can use a controller

- Pick up plugs and plug them into the outlets by pressing SPACE
